document.title: SP418-O-Healthy Children: 13-14 Months

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Guiding and caring for your child this next year will be a challenging and exciting experience. She’ll need a lot of attention and encouragement from you. You’ll need a sense of humor, some time for yourself, and lots of common sense. Knowing that your child’s dramatic and changeable behavior is both normal and temporary can help you during this time.
